name: Magellan
tag_list: mobile-apps, mobile-backend, cloud, cloud-services, saas, consulting, software
overview:
Mobile backen service and custom mobile app development.

Magellan is a software development company with a focus on mobile apps and server development. Magellan offers its M2 cloud platform as a service and develops custom end-to-end mobile software app solutions for its customers. Founded in 2001, Magellan has over 10 years of experience in developing and deploying commercial grade software platforms to mobile network operators around the world.
